sentences.en: A blue dyestuff can be obtained from the woad plant.
sentences.cn: 菘蓝属植物可以造蓝色染料.

sentences.en: A dyestuff obtained from the wood of this plant.
sentences.cn: 黄木染料从这种植物的木材中得到的染料.

sentences.en: A dyestuff wood of this plant.
sentences.cn: 一种取自菘蓝属植物的蓝色染料.

sentences.en: All the artwork can be eaten since no dyestuff is used, said Ju.
sentences.cn: 桔多淇表示，因为她没有用颜料，她的作品都能吃。

sentences.en: Diphenyl thiourea is an important intermediate of medicine and dyestuff.
sentences.cn: 二苯硫脲是重要的医药和染料的中间体.

sentences.en: Fiber reactive dyes - from true chemical bounds between dyestuff and fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维活性染料 -- 染料与纤维之间形成真正的化学键.

sentences.en: Fiber reactive dyes are from true chemical bounds between dyestuff and fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维活性染料来源于染料与纤维之间形成的真正化学键.

sentences.en: Mainiy use: Used to produce dyestuff, pigment, Surface active agent, Pharmaceutical material.
sentences.cn: 主要用途: 本品主要用作染料 、 颜料 、 表面活性剂, 医药合成的中间体.

sentences.en: Natural color has given way to such Bright - colored artificial dyestuff in effectiveness.
sentences.cn: 面对如此色彩斑斓的人工染料,自然色彩已俯首称臣.

sentences.en: Never tested cancer dyestuff from what we used dyestuff.
sentences.cn: 各种不同性质的染料中也未检测出含有致癌染料.

sentences.en: Nonlinear relation was obtained between color difference and dyestuff concentration.
sentences.cn: 色差与浓度呈非线性关系.

sentences.en: Remove dyestuff of dirt on the surface of printing belt clean.
sentences.cn: 清除残留在皮带上的染料及导物,维持清洁印花状态的装置.

sentences.en: The expression about difference and dyestuff concentration were got by multinomial fit.
sentences.cn: 用多项式拟合色差与染料浓度的表达式.

sentences.en: The function relation between difference and dyestuff concentration was obtained.
sentences.cn: 分析获得了色差与染料浓度的函数关系.

sentences.en: The reddish dyestuff obtained from any of these organisms.
sentences.cn: 苔色素由此类植物提出的红色染料.

sentences.en: There are German dyestuff patents that were confiscated by the United States during the First World War and became part of the foundation of the American chemical industry.
sentences.cn: 还包括第一次世界大战时美国从德国没收的染料专利资料，并最终成为美国化学工业基础的一部分。

sentences.en: Usage: Mainly used in chemical, glass , dyestuff, ceramic and mechanic.
sentences.cn: 用途: 主要用于化学 、 玻璃、染料 、 冶金、机械、搪瓷等工业.

sentences.en: Usage: Mainly used in chemical, glass, dyestuff, ceramic and mechanic.
sentences.cn: 用途：主要用于化学、 玻璃、染料、冶金、机械、搪瓷等工业。

trans.tran_en: a substance that can be used as a dye or from which a dye can be obtained
